## Framework.pipe property

Pipe a value through an array of functions. The return value of each callback is used as input for the next.

Signature:

```typescript
pipe: methods.pipe;
```

## Remarks

If no value is provided the value is assumed to be the [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) itself

is a non-mutational version of this method.

## Example

```js
app.pipe(
  [(value) => value + 1, (value) => value + 1],
  1 // initial value
); // resulting value is 3
```
